content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to execute a shell command to install iputils-ping and ping Google.com five times, but encountered an error. I then tried to update and install iputils-ping, but still received an error.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo apt-get install -y iputils-ping && ping -c 5 google.com"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_shell", "args": {"command_line": "sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y iputils-ping && ping -c 5 google.com"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Brno Reservoir trail"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://greatruns.com/brno-czechia-brno-reservoir-veveri-castle/", "https://www.alltrails.com/trail/czech-republic/south-moravian/stezka-brnenska-prehrada", "https://hikingisgood.com/around-the-brno-reservoir/", "https://www.outdooractive.com/mobile/en/route/hiking-route/czech-republic/brno-reservoir/29020361/", "https://www.gotobrno.cz/en/place/brno-reservoir/", "http://experienceeurope.eu/hiking-in-brno-my-top-5/", "https://www.south-moravia.com/en/sights/o70544-brno-reservoir", "https://www.tripsavvy.com/top-things-to-do-in-brno-czech-republic-5112855"]', type='action_result')]
"""
